title: Negative Situations | EPP Bonus Episode 412
description:
Did a young man who found himself in a dangerous situation at sea, somehow alert his grandmother of the danger he was in by a means of communication we don’t fully understand? 

The way we react as human beings to outside influences, living or dead is completely up to us. We have a choice. For one woman being tormented by a shadow person, this realization set her free.

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!

To get access to:
